406100.name: Angels That Kill - The Final Cut Soundtrack
406100.description:
The soundtrack for the dark adventure game Angels That Kill - The Final Cut.
You can find all of the artists on this soundtrack on
All music used for this game was used under the Creative Commons 0 License.

  • 01. Introduction
  • 02. Main Menu - Bradovic
  • 03. Walking Part 1 - edtijo
  • 04. Radio - KeffyStay
  • 05. Dreaming - cheeseouff
  • 06. Walking Part 2 - edtijo
  • 07. Pause Menu - yewbic
  • 08. Walking Part 3 - edtijo
  • 09. Chase - cheesepuff
  • 10. Credits - JoshuaRivera
  • 11. Encore - genelythgow
